BBQs Direct

BBQs Direct

We love our relaxed outdoor kiwi lifestyle and live the alfresco way of life, entertaining and eating outdoors – enjoying fun times with our family and friends.

At BBQs Direct we specialise in Gas Built-In BBQs & Outdoor Kitchens for the discerning entertainer. If you’re trying to look up some serious lifestyle BBQ and Grill options then we have the solutions for you.
 
Our high quality outdoor kitchen modules, built in additions and combo units and outdoor fridges provide the ultimate flexibility to create a kitchen unique to your own instant outdoor entertainment area. 
View our website for all the latest specials www.bbqsdirect.co.nz
